- - - ## [On Ecocomposition](https://proa.ua.pt/index.php/jdmi/article/view/3890) Carson, Tate. "On Ecocomposition." Journal of Digital Media & Interaction 3, no. 5 (2020): 133-142.
˃ Abstract

Composer and professor Damián Keller hasbeen researching ecologically grounded sounds, which come out of a study of ecology and the everyday environment, since the late 1980s. His work has dealt with a range of issues, including naive creativity, ubiquitous music making, and ecologically-based granular synthesis. He is interviewed here on topics of ecocomposition, everyday sound, and environmental activism.
